articles.description: All the latest Coventry City news as we bring you an update regarding the club shop and online store
articles.content:

The Sky Blues retail partner, Elite Sports Group, have gone into administration which … [+1232 chars]

articles.author: Dominic Hogan
articles.title: Gabriel Martinelli has the 'arrogance' to succeed for Brazil, claims Thiago Silva - Daily Mail
articles.description: Despite his call-up being somewhat of a shock, Martinelli has been in brilliant form this season, contributing five goals and two assists as Arsenal sit top of the table at Christmas.
articles.content:
Brazil captain Thiago Silva claimed that the 'arrogance' that Arsenal star Gabriel Martinelli show in his game is exactly what all elite attacking players need. 
The Chelsea defender heaped praise o… [+2906 chars]

articles.description: Tickets are now on sale for Newcastle United's final game of 2022 - a home clash with Leeds United.

articles.title: 'Huh?! Oh, wow!': France's Ousmane Dembélé learns Germany lost to Japan – video - The Guardian
articles.description: France forward Ousmane Dembélé couldn't help expressing his surprise when he learned that Germany lost to Japan in their opening World Cup match
articles.content:
France forward Ousmane Dembélé was shocked to learned Germany had lost to Japan in their opening World Cup match. 
Japan came from behind to beat Germany 2-1 in a frenzied finish in Group E for the … [+276 chars]

articles.title: World Cup: MARTIN SAMUEL insists Cristiano Ronaldo is no longer worth the fuss for Portugal - Daily Mail
articles.description: Samuel claims that Ronaldo, who is Portugal's captain and their all-time record goalscorer with 117 goals, is in fact hindering the progress of his national team and is no longer worth all the hassle.
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo is the 'high maintenance pest' that Portugal no longer need in their side, believes Martin Samuel.
